description:
longrifle: reddish brown striped wood; brass rod holders, trigger guard, butt and patch box with "made for my daughter Kori Noelle" engraved on it; "KNB" engraved in silver heart inlay on neck, "J.P. Brooks Dec. 25, 1984" engraved on top of barrel
sheath: white leather with flower design on PR and PL side; white beadwork on butt end of sheath; red tassels on front and rear of bag. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Curly maple, iron, steel, brass, silver, bone
title: American-style (c. 1790) 3/4-scale Flintlock Longrifle with Leather Sheath
